title: 'Sweet Kerolin' - Man City forward scores superb chip
body_text:
'Sweet Kerolin' - Man City forward scores superb chip

Manchester City forward Kerolin scores from a lightning-fast counter attack, the second of an eventual hat trick for the Brazilian against Chelsea.
MATCH REPORT: Manchester City 5-1 Chelsea
